typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	trm as double (1.00)
}
source(output(
		Escenario as string,
		CuentaAuxiliar as string,
		CuentaObjeto as string,
		Anio as string,
		Mes as string,
		Libro as string,
		CentroResponsabilidad as string,
		CodigoEmpresa as string,
		CodigoCompania as string,
		ValorOrigen as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sqlServerSource
sqlServerSource derive(ValorOrigenSensibilidad = ValorOrigen/$trm) ~> Sensibilidad
Sensibilidad sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Escenario as string,
		CuentaAuxiliar as string,
		CuentaObjeto as string,
		Anio as string,
		Mes as string,
		Libro as string,
		CentroResponsabilidad as string,
		CodigoEmpresa as string,
		CodigoCompania as string,
		ValorOrigen as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Guardar
